20110102060035.000|20110102065940.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110102060035.000|20110102060037.000|CC1|>> I WAS THE FIRST RESPONDING   
20110102060037.000|20110102060037.000|CC1|DEPUTY TO THE SCENE THAT NIGHT  
20110102060037.000|20110102060040.000|CC1|OF NOVEMBER OF '92.             
20110102060040.000|20110102060047.000|CC1|I'LL NEVER FORGET THAT NIGHT.   
20110102060047.000|20110102060048.000|CC1|A COUPLE CAME IN AND REPORTED   
20110102060048.000|20110102060050.000|CC1|THAT A CAR WAS SETTING DOWN AT  
20110102060050.000|20110102060052.000|CC1|THE OFF-RAMP WITH THE LIGHTS ON 
20110102060052.000|20110102060055.000|CC1|AND THE ENGINE RUNNING.         
20110102060055.000|20110102060059.000|CC1|WE OPENED THE DOOR, AND LOOKED  
20110102060059.000|20110102060101.000|CC1|IN WITH MY FLASHLIGHT, AND      
20110102060101.000|20110102060102.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN I SAW THIS GIRL     
20110102060102.000|20110102060103.000|CC1|SLUMPED OVER IN THE SEAT.       
20110102060103.000|20110102060105.000|CC1|THERE WAS A LOT OF BLOOD IN HER 
20110102060105.000|20110102060107.000|CC1|HAIR.                           
20110102060107.000|20110102060108.000|CC1|I REALLY THOUGHT THAT SHE WAS   
20110102060108.000|20110102060109.000|CC1|DEAD.                           
20110102060109.000|20110102060109.000|CC1|DIDN'T APPEAR TO BE BREATHING AT
20110102060109.000|20110102060111.000|CC1|ALL.                            
20110102060111.000|20110102060112.000|CC1|HER NAME WAS ANGELA MISCHELLE   
20110102060112.000|20110102060113.000|CC1|LAWLESS.                        
20110102060113.000|20110102060115.000|CC1|SHE WAS A 19-YEAR-OLD COLLEGE   
20110102060115.000|20110102060117.000|CC1|STUDENT.                        
20110102060117.000|20110102060118.000|CC1|SHE WAS APPROXIMATELY A HALF A  
20110102060118.000|20110102060119.000|CC1|MILE FROM HER RESIDENCE WHEN I  
20110102060119.000|20110102060124.000|CC1|FOUND HER.                      
20110102060124.000|20110102060125.000|CC1|THERE'S A LOT OF THINGS THAT    
20110102060125.000|20110102060127.000|CC1|HAPPENED THAT NIGHT THAT'S STILL
20110102060127.000|20110102060129.000|CC1|A MYSTERY.                      
20110102060129.000|20110102060130.000|CC1|SHE LEAVES HER BOYFRIEND'S      
20110102060130.000|20110102060131.000|CC1|HOUSE, AND SHE WAS ON HER WAY   
20110102060131.000|20110102060134.000|CC1|HOME.                           
20110102060134.000|20110102060134.000|CC1|IT'S POSSIBLE SOMEBODY WAS      
20110102060134.000|20110102060144.000|CC1|FOLLOWING HER UP THE INTERSTATE.
20110102060144.000|20110102060145.000|CC1|MAYBE THEY KNEW HER AND THEY GOT
20110102060145.000|20110102060149.000|CC1|HER TO PULL OVER AND STOP.      
20110102060149.000|20110102060150.000|CC1|IF SHE KNEW THEM-- AND I BELIEVE
20110102060150.000|20110102060151.000|CC1|SHE DID KNOW THEM-- I THINK SHE 
20110102060151.000|20110102060152.000|CC1|KNEW HOW BAD THEY WERE AND HOW  
20110102060152.000|20110102060156.000|CC1|SERIOUS THIS SITUATION WAS.     
20110102060156.000|20110102060157.000|CC1|AND MAYBE THAT'S WHY SHE ENDED  
20110102060157.000|20110102060159.000|CC1|UP AT THE BOTTOM OF THE HILL.   
20110102060159.000|20110102060201.000|CC1|MAYBE SHE WAS RUNNING FOR HER   
20110102060201.000|20110102060203.000|CC1|LIFE, AND THEY CAUGHT HER.      
20110102060203.000|20110102060207.000|CC1|THE BEATING STARTED THERE.      
20110102060207.000|20110102060208.000|CC1|ONCE IT STARTED, IT WAS LIKE IN 
20110102060208.000|20110102060209.000|CC1|A RAGE AND THERE WAS NO         
20110102060209.000|20110102060212.000|CC1|STOPPING.                       
20110102060212.000|20110102060212.000|CC1|BUT THE WORST PART WAS YET TO   
20110102060212.000|20110102060213.000|CC1|COME, WHENEVER SHE WAS PUT BACK 
20110102060213.000|20110102060224.000|CC1|IN THE CAR.                     
20110102060224.000|20110102060225.000|CC1|SHE WAS SHOT THREE TIMES AT     
20110102060225.000|20110102060228.000|CC1|POINTBLANK RANGE.               
20110102060228.000|20110102060231.000|CC1|THIS WAS COLD-BLOODED.          
20110102060231.000|20110102060231.000|CC1|I THINK THIS PERSON IS A        
20110102060231.000|20110102060237.000|CC1|MONSTER.                        
20110102060237.000|20110102060240.000|CC1|>> I WAS CALLED A MONSTER.      
20110102060240.000|20110102060245.000|CC1|CALLING ME A KILLER.            
20110102060245.000|20110102060248.000|CC1|CALLING ME A MURDERER.          
20110102060248.000|20110102060249.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T NEED TO GET ANY WORSE
20110102060249.000|20110102060251.000|CC1|THAN THAT.                      
20110102060251.000|20110102060252.000|CC1|>> JOSH KEZER WAS CONVICTED OF  
20110102060252.000|20110102060255.000|CC1|THE MURDER OF ANGELA MISCHELLE  
20110102060255.000|20110102060255.000|CC1|LAWLESS, SERVING 60 YEARS AT THE
20110102060255.000|20110102060301.000|CC1|STATE CORRECTIONAL FACILITY.    
20110102060301.000|20110102060302.000|CC1|>> THE ONLY THING I REMEMBER IS 
20110102060302.000|20110102060304.000|CC1|WHEN THE VERDICT CAME BACK, I   
20110102060304.000|20110102060306.000|CC1|WENT NUMB.                      
20110102060306.000|20110102060308.000|CC1|EVERYTHING BECAME LIKE I WAS IN 
20110102060308.000|20110102060311.000|CC1|A DRUM, LIKE ALL THE VOICES,    
20110102060311.000|20110102060312.000|CC1|OTHER THAN MY OWN, WERE AT A    
20110102060312.000|20110102060321.000|CC1|DISTANCE.                       
20110102060321.000|20110102060325.000|CC1|I WAS YELLING, "IT WASN'T ME.   
20110102060325.000|20110102060328.000|CC1|I DIDN'T DO IT."                
20110102060328.000|20110102060329.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS PEOPLE THAT CAME   
20110102060329.000|20110102060331.000|CC1|FORWARD AND SAID THAT HE HAD    
20110102060331.000|20110102060331.000|CC1|BRAGGED ABOUT KILLING MISCHELLE 
20110102060331.000|20110102060333.000|CC1|LAWLESS.                        
20110102060333.000|20110102060335.000|CC1|>> I HAD NEVER MET MISCHELLE    
20110102060335.000|20110102060337.000|CC1|LAWLESS.                        
20110102060337.000|20110102060339.000|CC1|THE NIGHT THAT MISCHELLE WAS    
20110102060339.000|20110102060342.000|CC1|MURDERED, I WAS 350 MILES AWAY. 
20110102060342.000|20110102060345.000|CC1|I'M AN INNOCENT MAN.            
20110102060345.000|20110102060346.000|CC1|>> PEOPLE KEPT ASKING ME, "DO   
20110102060346.000|20110102060349.000|CC1|YOU HAVE THE RIGHT PERSON IN    
20110102060349.000|20110102060350.000|CC1|PRISON?"                        
20110102060350.000|20110102060351.000|CC1|IN THE BACK OF MY MIND THERE WAS
20110102060351.000|20110102060352.000|CC1|A POSSIBILITY THAT MAYBE JOSH   
20110102060352.000|20110102060353.000|CC1|DIDN'T DO THIS.                 
20110102060353.000|20110102060356.000|CC1|IF JOSH KEZER DIDN'T DO IT, I   
20110102060356.000|20110102060358.000|CC1|HATE TO THINK THAT THERE'S      
20110102060358.000|20110102060359.000|CC1|SOMEBODY STILL OUT THERE THAT'S 
20110102060359.000|20110102060400.000|CC1|RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS AND GOT    
20110102060400.000|20110102060402.000|CC1|AWAY WITH IT ALL THESE YEARS.   
20110102060402.000|20110102060403.000|CC1|I THINK THEY SHOULD BE LOCKED UP
20110102060403.000|20110102060405.000|CC1|LIKE THE ANIMAL THAT THEY ARE.  
20110102060405.000|20110102060406.000|CC1|AND I WOULD VERY MUCH LIKE TO   
20110102060406.000|20110102060408.000|CC1|FIND OUT WHO THAT IS, AND I     
20110102060408.000|20110102060411.000|CC1|WILL.

20110102060625.000|20110102060627.000|CC1|WISH THAT MAYBE I HAD LISTENED A
20110102060627.000|20110102060630.000|CC1|LITTLE MORE, OR BEEN THERE A    
20110102060630.000|20110102060631.000|CC1|LITTLE MORE, BECAUSE SHE WAS    
20110102060631.000|20110102060636.000|CC1|ALWAYS THERE FOR ME.            
20110102060636.000|20110102060637.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MORE THAN 18 YEARS 
20110102060637.000|20110102060639.000|CC1|HAVE PASSED SINCE 19-YEAR-OLD   
20110102060639.000|20110102060640.000|CC1|MISCHELLE LAWLESS WAS FOUND     
20110102060640.000|20110102060641.000|CC1|BLUDGEONED AND SHOT TO DEATH IN 
20110102060641.000|20110102060644.000|CC1|HER CAR.                        
20110102060644.000|20110102060644.000|CC1|>> SOME OF THIS STUFF IS HARD TO
20110102060644.000|20110102060646.000|CC1|READ.                           
20110102060646.000|20110102060647.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND IT'S STILL NOT 
20110102060647.000|20110102060648.000|CC1|EASY FOR HER BEST FRIEND TO READ
20110102060648.000|20110102060651.000|CC1|THE CHEERY DIARY THAT MISCHELLE 
20110102060651.000|20110102060653.000|CC1|KEPT THE LAST YEAR OF HER LIFE. 
20110102060653.000|20110102060656.000|CC1|>> "JANUARY 1, SLEPT REAL LATE. 
20110102060656.000|20110102060657.000|CC1|FAMILY WENT TO MINGO AND I TO   
20110102060657.000|20110102060659.000|CC1|LEON'S.                         
20110102060659.000|20110102060700.000|CC1|WE LOVED AND ATE AND TALKED AND 
20110102060700.000|20110102060701.000|CC1|RENTED MOVIES.                  
20110102060701.000|20110102060702.000|CC1|MADE ME FEEL LOVED TODAY, AND I 
20110102060702.000|20110102060704.000|CC1|AM REALLY HAPPY.                
20110102060704.000|20110102060706.000|CC1|LOVE HIM.                       
20110102060706.000|20110102060710.000|CC1|GREAT FIRST DAY OF 1992."       
20110102060710.000|20110102060711.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MELISSA GAINES MET 
20110102060711.000|20110102060712.000|CC1|MISCHELLE WHEN THEY WERE HIGH   
20110102060712.000|20110102060713.000|CC1|SCHOOL FRESHMEN IN BENTON,      
20110102060713.000|20110102060714.000|CC1|MISSOURI.                       
20110102060714.000|20110102060716.000|CC1|>> I HAD JUST MOVED TO KELLY    
20110102060716.000|20110102060717.000|CC1|HIGH SCHOOL, DIDN'T KNOW        
20110102060717.000|20110102060718.000|CC1|ANYBODY.                        
20110102060718.000|20110102060720.000|CC1|HER LITTLE BUBBLY SELF COME     
20110102060720.000|20110102060722.000|CC1|BOUNCING UP AND INTRODUCED      
20110102060722.000|20110102060723.000|CC1|HERSELF AND IT WAS ALL OVER.    
20110102060723.000|20110102060725.000|CC1|SHE WAS PART OF MY LIFE FROM    
20110102060725.000|20110102060728.000|CC1|THAT MOMENT ON.                 
20110102060728.000|20110102060729.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHILE MISCHELLE    
20110102060729.000|20110102060731.000|CC1|STOOD BARELY FIVE FEET TALL...  
20110102060731.000|20110102060732.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS JUST LITTLE BITTY.   
20110102060732.000|20110102060734.000|CC1|SHE WAS TINY.                   
20110102060734.000|20110102060735.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ...SHE WAS NO LIGHT
20110102060735.000|20110102060738.000|CC1|WEIGHT.                         
20110102060738.000|20110102060739.000|CC1|SHE WAS A GREEN BELT IN KARATE, 
20110102060739.000|20110102060741.000|CC1|HALFWAY TO EARNING A BLACK BELT.
20110102060741.000|20110102060741.000|CC1|>> I CAN'T EVEN REMEMBER        
20110102060741.000|20110102060744.000|CC1|ANYTHING SHE WAS EVER SCARED OF.
20110102060744.000|20110102060748.000|CC1|SHE WAS FEARLESS.               
20110102060748.000|20110102060749.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WOULD IT EVER OCCUR
20110102060749.000|20110102060750.000|CC1|TO YOU THAT MISCHELLE MIGHT BE  
20110102060750.000|20110102060753.000|CC1|IN DANGER?                      
20110102060753.000|20110102060753.000|CC1|>> NO.                          
20110102060753.000|20110102060754.000|CC1|NO.                             
20110102060754.000|20110102060755.000|CC1|I MEAN, THAT NEVER WAS A THOUGHT
20110102060755.000|20110102060759.000|CC1|TO ME, NEVER.                   
20110102060759.000|20110102060801.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHICH IS WHY WHAT  
20110102060801.000|20110102060804.000|CC1|HAPPENED IN THE EARLY-MORNING   
20110102060804.000|20110102060805.000|CC1|HOURS OF NOVEMBER 8, 1992, WAS  
20110102060805.000|20110102060807.000|CC1|SO UNEXPECTED, SO SHOCKING.     
20110102060807.000|20110102060810.000|CC1|HOW BRUTAL A MURDER WAS THIS?   
20110102060810.000|20110102060812.000|CC1|>> VERY.                        
20110102060812.000|20110102060813.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THAT'S RICK WALTER,
20110102060813.000|20110102060815.000|CC1|THE MAN WITH THE MUSTACHE.      
20110102060815.000|20110102060816.000|CC1|HE WAS A 32-YEAR-OLD PART-TIME  
20110102060816.000|20110102060817.000|CC1|DEPUTY SHERIFF WHEN HE          
20110102060817.000|20110102060818.000|CC1|DISCOVERED THE BODY OF MISCHELLE
20110102060818.000|20110102060819.000|CC1|LAWLESS.                        
20110102060819.000|20110102060822.000|CC1|>> THIS IS SMALL TOWN U.S.A.    
20110102060822.000|20110102060822.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, A LOT OF STUFF LIKE   
20110102060822.000|20110102060825.000|CC1|THIS JUST DOESN'T HAPPEN.       
20110102060825.000|20110102060827.000|CC1|>> FEMALE'S HEAD IS SLUMPED OVER
20110102060827.000|20110102060829.000|CC1|ON THE PASSENGER SEAT.          
20110102060829.000|20110102060830.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POLICE DOCUMENTED  
20110102060830.000|20110102060832.000|CC1|THE GRISLY SCENE, USING BLOOD   
20110102060832.000|20110102060833.000|CC1|EVIDENCE TO RECONSTRUCT         
20110102060833.000|20110102060835.000|CC1|MISCHELLE'S FINAL, TERRIFYING   
20110102060835.000|20110102060836.000|CC1|MOMENTS.                        
20110102060836.000|20110102060837.000|CC1|>> WHAT APPEARS TO BE BLOOD     
20110102060837.000|20110102060839.000|CC1|SPLATTERS ON THE HIGHWAY.       
20110102060839.000|20110102060840.000|CC1|>> I BELIEVE THAT SHE GOT OUT OF
20110102060840.000|20110102060841.000|CC1|THE VEHICLE AND I THINK THERE   
20110102060841.000|20110102060843.000|CC1|WAS AN ARGUMENT.                
20110102060843.000|20110102060844.000|CC1|>> POOL OF BLOOD, 16, 18        
20110102060844.000|20110102060846.000|CC1|INCHES...                       
20110102060846.000|20110102060848.000|CC1|>> SHE ENDED UP OVER THE        
20110102060848.000|20110102060849.000|CC1|GUARDRAIL AND DOWN THE BOTTOM OF
20110102060849.000|20110102060853.000|CC1|THE SLOPE.                      
20110102060853.000|20110102060854.000|CC1|A VERY VIOLENT ALTERCATION TOOK 
20110102060854.000|20110102060854.000|CC1|PLACE.                          
20110102060854.000|20110102060856.000|CC1|I BELIEVE THAT SHE WAS BEAT AT  
20110102060856.000|20110102060857.000|CC1|THE BOTTOM AND KNOCKED          
20110102060857.000|20110102060858.000|CC1|UNCONSCIOUS.                    
20110102060858.000|20110102060900.000|CC1|THERE WAS A LOT OF BLOOD.       
20110102060900.000|20110102060901.000|CC1|>> THERE APPEARS TO BE A        
20110102060901.000|20110102060901.000|CC1|TRAIL...                        
20110102060901.000|20110102060902.000|CC1|>> THERE'S SOME RIGHT THERE.    
20110102060902.000|20110102060906.000|CC1|>> THERE'S SOME RIGHT THERE.    
20110102060906.000|20110102060907.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE WAS ALSO     
20110102060907.000|20110102060908.000|CC1|BLOOD UNDER MISCHELLE'S         
20110102060908.000|20110102060911.000|CC1|FINGERNAILS.                    
20110102060911.000|20110102060913.000|CC1|AND MARKS ON HER RIGHT HAND AND 
20110102060913.000|20110102060915.000|CC1|WRIST, SUGGESTING SHE HAD FOUGHT
20110102060915.000|20110102060916.000|CC1|HER ASSAILANTS.                 
20110102060916.000|20110102060917.000|CC1|>> I THINK SHE WAS FIGHTING FOR 
20110102060917.000|20110102060918.000|CC1|HER LIFE.                       
20110102060918.000|20110102060919.000|CC1|I THINK SHE WAS FIGHTING MORE   
20110102060919.000|20110102060920.000|CC1|THAN ONE PERSON.                
20110102060920.000|20110102060921.000|CC1|THERE WAS A BLOOD TRAIL GOING   
20110102060921.000|20110102060924.000|CC1|BACK UP THE HILL.               
20110102060924.000|20110102060925.000|CC1|THEY CARRIED HER ACROSS THE

20110102061925.000|20110102061927.000|CC1|>> WAS IT JUST A FLUKE?

20110102061929.000|20110102061933.000|CC1|THE WRONG TIME?

20110102061938.000|20110102061939.000|CC1|THEIR MOTHER.

20110102061941.000|20110102061944.000|CC1|HOURS, WHO SHE WAS WITH?

20110102065338.000|20110102065342.000|CC1|UPRIGHT IN HER SEAT THAT NIGHT. 
20110102065342.000|20110102065343.000|CC1|WHERE EXACTLY DID YOU GRAB HER? 
20110102065343.000|20110102065348.000|CC1|>> ON THE SHOULDER, KIND OF--   
20110102065348.000|20110102065349.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE BEEN BY THE BREAST A 
20110102065349.000|20110102065350.000|CC1|LITTLE BIT.                     
20110102065350.000|20110102065351.000|CC1|I CAN'T FULLY REMEMBER.

20110102065351.000|20110102065353.000|CC1|YOU KNOW.                       
20110102065353.000|20110102065354.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IF I WERE THE      
20110102065354.000|20110102065355.000|CC1|DRIVER--                        
20110102065355.000|20110102065356.000|CC1|>> YOUR SHOULDER.               
20110102065356.000|20110102065356.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS SHOULDER?

20110102065404.000|20110102065405.000|CC1|COUPLE SAY THEY FOUND WHAT IS   
20110102065405.000|20110102065407.000|CC1|LIKELY ABBOTT'S D.N.A. IN OTHER 
20110102065407.000|20110102065410.000|CC1|PLACES ON LAWLESS' CLOTHES.

20110102065422.000|20110102065423.000|CC1|HER, THAT'S WHAT WE FIND, THEN  
20110102065423.000|20110102065429.000|CC1|HE HAS A PROBLEM.               
20110102065429.000|20110102065429.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN DECEMBER 2009,  
20110102065429.000|20110102065431.000|CC1|MARK ABBOTT WAS MOVED           
20110102065431.000|20110102065433.000|CC1|TEMPORARILY FROM THE FEDERAL    
20110102065433.000|20110102065436.000|CC1|PRISON WHERE HE'S DOING TIME ON 
20110102065436.000|20110102065438.000|CC1|THOSE DRUG CHARGES, TO MISSOURI 
20110102065438.000|20110102065438.000|CC1|FOR A HEARING ON AN UNRELATED   
20110102065438.000|20110102065441.000|CC1|CHARGE.                         
20110102065441.000|20110102065441.000|CC1|>> WALTER?                      
20110102065441.000|20110102065442.000|CC1|>> HEY.

20110102065442.000|20110102065443.000|CC1|GOING ON.                       
20110102065443.000|20110102065444.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE FAMOUS?               
20110102065444.000|20110102065445.000|CC1|>> YEAH, ( BLEEP ), THANKS.     
20110102065445.000|20110102065448.000|CC1|I CAN'T THANK NOBODY BUT YOU.   
20110102065448.000|20110102065449.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ABBOTT AGREED TO   
20110102065449.000|20110102065451.000|CC1|TALK TO SHERIFF WALTER ABOUT THE
20110102065451.000|20110102065453.000|CC1|LAWLESS CASE, EVEN OFFERING HIS

20110102065454.000|20110102065455.000|CC1|SHIPPED OFF TO THE CRIME FARM   
20110102065455.000|20110102065458.000|CC1|FOR ADDITIONAL TESTING.         
20110102065458.000|20110102065502.000|CC1|AND WHAT ABOUT LEON LAMB?       
20110102065502.000|20110102065504.000|CC1|THE DUTCH CONFIRMED THAT LAMB'S 
20110102065504.000|20110102065505.000|CC1|D.N.A. IS MIXED WITH MISCHELLE'S
20110102065505.000|20110102065506.000|CC1|BLOOD THAT WAS FOUND UNDER HER  
20110102065506.000|20110102065508.000|CC1|FINGERNAILS.

20110102065509.000|20110102065512.000|CC1|HAD SEX WITH MISCHELLE EARLIER  
20110102065512.000|20110102065514.000|CC1|THE NIGHT SHE WAS KILLED, BUT   
20110102065514.000|20110102065516.000|CC1|THEY DON'T FIND ANYONE ELSE'S   
20110102065516.000|20110102065517.000|CC1|D.N.A., AND THAT IS SOMETHING OF
20110102065517.000|20110102065520.000|CC1|A SURPRISE.

20110102065523.000|20110102065523.000|CC1|>> SHE WOULDN'T TAKE ANYTHING

20110102065530.000|20110102065532.000|CC1|FOUGHT FOR HER LIFE THAT NIGHT. 
20110102065532.000|20110102065533.000|CC1|>> Reporter: A REASON TO        
20110102065533.000|20110102065534.000|CC1|CONTINUE LOOKING AT LEON, SAYS  
20110102065534.000|20110102065536.000|CC1|SHERIFF WALTER, ALTHOUGH HE

20110102065537.000|20110102065539.000|CC1|HAVE MADE CONTACT WITH HER

20110102065543.000|20110102065545.000|CC1|ANY OF THEIR SKIN CELLS.

20110102065616.000|20110102065617.000|CC1|ALLOW HIM TO GO TO A GRAND JURY

20110102065635.000|20110102065637.000|CC1|HIM BACK TO THE NOW-CLOSED
